message.content: This question requires knowledge about recycling and the process of turning waste materials into new products. One way to recycle plastic is by turning it into shoes. Plastic can be melted down and reprocessed to create materials used in the manufacturing of shoes. Option (A) is incorrect because plastic cannot be turned into food. Option (C) is incorrect because plastic cannot be turned into trees. Option (D) is incorrect because plastic cannot be turned into rivers.
